title: Is this normal in diamond?!
body:
So as you can see from the 2 pictures i took from my match history, it took me 8 WINS IN A ROW to get from 0 lp to promos in diamond 4. 
Is this normal? like how am i supposed to do that again 3 times? when i win i get a measly 12-13lp, but when i lose i lose 20-22lp. That's not okay lol.

replies.body: You get lp based on your win rate I believe.
Well my winrate is 52% so i don't think it depends on your wr.
It really doesn't. Diamond if anything just has a fixed LP gain that results in a net loss.
Diamond is absolute shit, it's always been like that ever since they nerfed the LP gain in diamond.

You probably just climbed too fast for your MMR to catch up.  IF you hold a 50% win rate where you are for a bit, the LP lost and gained will even out.  If you truly are better than the rank you're at, you should start climbing once that happens.

if you look at your games average you are still in platinum 1

keep in mind that d5 is in d4 so climbing from d4 to d3 is in practice like climbing from d5 to d3
it should take longer but once you do your mmr will even out and you will be good to go
